prompts.prompt:
## Initial Context for Multi-Part Generation

Original Request: "Generate core router, loop bridges, and agent scene simulators for the mythic engine"

This will be generated in 5 parts:
1. Core router that observes all surfaces and routes users
2. Bridge that makes all surfaces aware of each other
3. Define all game surfaces and their conditions

Please acknowledge this plan and prepare for component generation.

Session Context:
- Each component will reference previous outputs
- Final output will be stitched together
- Maintain consistency across all parts

## Component Generation: CalWorldRouter

Session: session_1750602155075
Previous outputs are available in context.

Task: Core router that observes all surfaces and routes users

Requirements:
- Observe mood_state.json, loop_active.json, agent_signature.json
- Route based on attunement, agent match, loop pressure
- Include Cal's decision logic

Output Format:
- File path: /core_router/CalWorldRouter.js
- Type: javascript
- Must be complete and functional
- Reference previous components if needed

Generate only this component now.

## Component Generation: LoopReflectionBridge

Session: session_1750602155075
Previous outputs are available in context.

Task: Bridge that makes all surfaces aware of each other

Requirements:
- Expose shared session_state.json
- Allow read/write of loop tone and drift
- Connect to CalWorldRouter

Output Format:
- File path: /bridges/LoopReflectionBridge.js
- Type: javascript
- Must be complete and functional
- Reference previous components if needed

Generate only this component now.

## Component Generation: WorldManifest

Session: session_1750602155075
Previous outputs are available in context.

Task: Define all game surfaces and their conditions

Requirements:
- Include entry/exit conditions for each world
- Define agent presence
- Specify mood triggers

Output Format:
- File path: /worlds/world_manifest.json
- Type: json
- Must be complete and functional
- Reference previous components if needed

Generate only this component now.

## Final Stitching and Reflection

Session: session_1750602155075

All components have been generated:
- /core_router/CalWorldRouter.js
- /bridges/LoopReflectionBridge.js
- /worlds/world_manifest.json

Tasks:
1. Verify all components work together
2. Create integration test: /tasks/resolved/session_1750602155075_test.js
3. Add reflection entry to /ledger/design_reflections.json

Reflection should include:
- Session ID
- Components created
- Integration notes
- Any warnings or considerations
